title: The Collected CBLDF Comics (20 Books|1998->|40% Dgtl/70% HR)
description:
Cover:      <a href=" http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/yuq/users/29/766/1OCXkESUwl.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/yuq/users/29/766/1OCXkESUwl.png</a>


Overviews:  <a href=" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comic_Book_Legal_Defense_Fund" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comic_Book_Legal_Defense_Fund</a>


Contains:    More or less everything available that was published directly by, or in
             collaboration with, or on behalf of, the CBLDF, which includes not only
             the original quarterly newsletter and the recent anti-censorship-themed
             publications, but also a series of lesser-known and less tightly
             focussed story collections published during the early 2000s.
             
             Note that whereas in total, there are about twice as many releases, I
             went through all of the rest, and this is what was left over after
             throwing out lower-quality versions with essentially duplicate content.
             
             In the case of the 2008-2012 "Liberty" comics and annuals, the 2014
             reprint volume included here offered superior quality but was missing
             one of the stories and a bunch of the pinups, and I went to the trouble
             of gleaning those bits and pieces from the original editions to include
             them individually... for your unstinted reading pleasure! ;)


Note:       <a href=" http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/kat/community/show/resolution-tagging" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gesserit.000space.com/meta/kat/community/show/resolution-tagging</a>
